snippet: Federal authorities investigating the collapse of MF Global have expanded their inquiry to include the CME Group, the operator of the main exchange where the firm conducted business.
abstract: Federal authorities investigating the collapse of MF Global have expanded their inquiry to include the CME Group, the operator of the main exchange where the firm conducted business.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and AZAM AHMED

lead_paragraph: Federal authorities investigating the collapse of MF Global have expanded their inquiry to include the actions of the CME Group, the operator of the main exchange where the commodities brokerage firm conducted business, according to people briefed on the matter.

headline.main: MF Global Inquiry Turns  to Its Primary Regulator
